first_para: Virendra Kumar Sharma (born 5 April 1947) is a British Labour Party politician and the Member of Parliament (MP) for Ealing Southall since 2007.

full.extract: Virendra Kumar Sharma (born 5 April 1947) is a British Labour Party politician and the Member of Parliament (MP) for Ealing Southall since 2007.
full.title: Virendra Sharma
